meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7065.

td.p: Louis Virtel, a journalist and comic originally from Lemont, Illinois
Mary Green, a college instructor from Milton, Georgia
Andrew Haringer, a college instructor from Squamish, British Columbia, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,799)

tr.td: LET'S HAVE LEFTOVERS
THE SETTING, SON
HOMOPHONIC PAIRS
FADS & FASHIONS
FIRST LADY FIRST NAMES
NASCAR

Louis

tr.td: Andrew
Mary
Louis
LET'S HAVE LEFTOVERS
4-WORD EXCHANGE
A. MILLER'S TALES
STEPPE BY STEPPE
WHAT AN INVENTION
